title: PlayStation State of Play Recap - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.10.19
description:
Get started for $5 at forhims.com/gamesdaily

Get $30 off 23andMe’s Health + Ancestry Kit at 23andme.com/games

Nathan Brandt from www.twitch.tv/twoheadedgiant joins Greg to talk about Predator: Hunting Grounds, Final Fantasy VII Remake, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:003:22 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase is June 10th at 4:30 p.m. PT! Youtube.com/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report -
00:06:11 - PlayStation State of Play
00:14:25 - “Why not just wait the extra month to show Final Fantasy 7?” - Soup
00:18:56 - “NEXT MONTH IS NEXT MONTH I WANT WILD SPECULATION NOW!” - Borzen00
00:26:47 - Ghost Recon Breakpoint Deets
00:33:21 - “Yesterday Ubisoft announced Ghost Recon Breakpoint...but why?” - Tommyboy
00:34:32 - April’s Top PSN Downloads
00:35:50 - Wolfenstein Young Blood has Dishonored-like Levels?!
00:40:18 - Out today
00:46:15 - Hims
00:47:30 - 23&Me
Reader mail -
00:48:39 - “Recently you've discussed how EA is trying to address how it wants to engage more with it's customers…” - Titan Meteor
00:54:03 - “Do you get political statements from certain games?” - BJ Bernardo
01:01:18 - Squad Up: John Goebel - PS4 - goebelfam
01:02:11 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Fran & Tim
Tuesday - Fran & Tim
Wednesday - Tim & Whitta
Thursday - Fran & ????
Friday - Greg & Andrea
